post:

The virtual hosting plans offered by WHUK ensure optimum performance and offer an ideal platform essential to run large websites, mobile apps and other install third party applications. While the Windows VPS is powered by industry acclaimed Microsoft’s Hyper-V hypervisor technology, it provides with maximum efficiency and performance for websites.
